actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

official_title: To ensure that health professions opportunity demonstration projects train project participants to earn a recognized postsecondary credential, and to clarify that community colleges are eligible for grants to conduct such a demonstration project.
short_title: Promoting Health Careers in Community and Technical Colleges Act

summary.text:
Promoting Health Careers in Community and Technical Colleges Act

This bill requires recipients of certain grants that provide low-income individuals with education and training for health care occupations to train project participants to earn recognized postsecondary credentials, including industry-recognized credentials.

titles.title: Promoting Health Careers in Community and Technical Colleges Act

To ensure that health professions opportunity demonstration projects train project participants to earn a recognized postsecondary credential, and to clarify that community colleges are eligible for grants to conduct such a demonstration project.
Promoting Health Careers in Community and Technical Colleges Act
